argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | lcvp.s | |- S = ( LSubSp ` W ) |
| 2 |  | lcvp.p | |- .(+) = ( LSSum ` W ) |
| 3 |  | lcvp.o | |- .0. = ( 0g ` W ) |
| 4 |  | lcvp.a | |- A = ( LSAtoms ` W ) |
| 5 |  | lcvp.c | |- C = ( <oL ` W ) |
| 6 |  | lcvp.w | |- ( ph -> W e. LVec ) |
| 7 |  | lcvp.u | |- ( ph -> U e. S ) |
| 8 |  | lcvp.q | |- ( ph -> Q e. A ) |
| 9 |  | #P_lveclmod | |- ( W e. LVec -> W e. LMod ) |
| 10 | 6, 9 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> W e. LMod ) |
| 11 | 1, 4, 10, 8 | #P_lsatlssel | |- ( ph -> Q e. S ) |
| 12 | 1 | #P_lssincl | |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ U e. S /\ Q e. S ) -> ( U i^i Q ) e. S ) |
| 13 | 10, 7, 11, 12 | #P_syl3anc | |- ( ph -> ( U i^i Q ) e. S ) |
| 14 | 3, 1, 4, 5, 6, 13, 8 | #P_lsatcveq0 | |- ( ph -> ( ( U i^i Q ) C Q <-> ( U i^i Q ) = { .0. } ) ) |
| 15 | 1, 2, 5, 10, 7, 11 | #P_lcvexch | |- ( ph -> ( ( U i^i Q ) C Q <-> U C ( U .(+) Q ) ) ) |
| 16 | 14, 15 | #P_bitr3d | |- ( ph -> ( ( U i^i Q ) = { .0. } <-> U C ( U .(+) Q ) ) ) |
